summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2011 INFINITI G37. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED INDEPENDENTLY WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT DROVE AT A LOW SPEED IN A SHOPPING CENTER PARKING LOT. THE VEHICLE CAME TO A STOP WHEN IT CRASHED INTO A STORE WALL. THE CONTACT SUSTAINED INJURIES TO THE BACK, NOSE, RIBS, AND NECK, WHICH REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED AND TOWED. THE MANUFACTURER AND THE DEALER WERE NOT NOTIFIED. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 15,000.  ...UPDATED 08/02/17 *BF  UPDATED 10/20/2017*JS    *CN
